verbose_text: To test whether post-24 h LiCl treatment reduces oxt expression at other treatment stages and durations, we treated 28 hpf embryos for 3.75 h, 31 hpf embryos for 4.5 h, 36 hpf embryos for 12 h, and 41 hpf embryos for 5 h. Using WISH, reductions in oxt expression were detected after LiCl treatment at 31 hpf for 4.5 h and 41 hpf for 5 h (XREF_FIG J, J ', K, K ').
